title: The Swiss Army Knife: 33 Tools in Your Pocket
description: One-minute skill: The Swiss Army Knife: 33 Tools in Your Pocket.

hook.text: In 1891, Karl Elsener wanted Swiss soldiers to stop carrying German knives. National pride drove genius design.

buildup.text: Elsener invented a spring mechanism that held multiple blades on both sides of a single handle.

twist.text: NASA sends Swiss Army Knives to space. Astronauts rely on this 130-year-old design.

climax.text: The Swiss Army Knife endures because it solves real problems with minimal material and maximum thought.

punchline.text: The most versatile tool ever made fits in your pocket.
